data.meta_description: Learn how to change registered name in Torrent Power Ahmedabad bill online on Bajaj Finserv and pay electricity bill payment using cards, UPI and Wallet.
data.text:
Torrent Power is an Indian energy company with interests in power generation, transmission, and distribution. It distributes power to over 4.13 million customers annually in its distribution areas. It covers Ahmedabad, Gandhinagar, Surat, Dahej SEZ, and Dholera SIR in Gujarat.

Torrent Power has an aggregate generating capacity of more than 4 GW with a mix of coal-based, gas-based, and renewable power plants. The company has a proven track record of implementing large power projects. Torrent Power is headquartered in Ahmedabad and is a subsidiary of Torrent Investments Pvt Ltd.

How to change the registered name in Torrent Power Ahmedabad electricity bill payment

Torrent Power is the electricity distribution company serving Ahmedabad, Gujarat. To change the registered name on a Torrent Power electricity bill, customers can visit the Torrent Power customer portal. They can then download the "Name Change Requisition Form".

The form requires providing supporting documents such as the latest utility bill, sale/lease deed, or tax documents. After submitting the completed form and documents, Torrent Power will process the name change request. The process is straightforward and can be completed online. This allows customers to easily update the registered name on their electricity bill.

Why change registered name in Torrent Power Ahmedabad electricity bill

Changing the registered name on a Torrent Power Ahmedabad electricity bill is important for a few key reasons:

Ownership transfer: When the ownership of a property changes, the electricity bill needs to be updated with the new owner's name.

Accuracy of records: Ensuring the registered name matches the actual owner helps maintain accurate electricity billing and account records.

Legal documentation: The electricity bill serves as a legal document, so the registered name must reflect the true owner.

Smooth transactions: Having the correct name on the electricity bill facilitates smooth transactions, such as when selling or renting the property.

Overall, updating the registered name keeps the electricity account information current and aligned with the property's ownership status.

Different ways to change your registered name in the Torrent Power Ahmedabad electricity bill

To change the registered name on a Torrent Power Ahmedabad electricity bill, you can visit the local electricity board office. You can then fill out an application form and submit the required documents such as proof of ownership.

Alternatively, you can initiate the process online through the Torrent Power Ahmedabad website.

Online method

Visit the Torrent Power Ahmedabad website and locate the online name change application.

Fill out the required form with the new name and supporting documents like proof of identity.

Submit the online application and pay any associated fees.

The electricity board will verify the information and update the name on the account.

The updated name will reflect on future electricity bills.

Offline method

Visit the local Torrent Power Ahmedabad electricity board office in person.

Obtain the necessary application form for name change.

Fill out the form completely with the new name and required details.

Attach supporting documents like proof of identity and ownership.

Submit the filled application form along with the documents.

Pay the applicable processing fee, if any.

The electricity board will verify the information and update the name on your account.

The updated name will reflect on your future electricity bills.

Conclusion

Customers can change their name in their electricity bill either online or offline. It involves downloading the 'LT Name Change Requisition Form' from the Torrent Power customer portal. Then you can fill it out and submit it along with supporting documents.

The offline method requires visiting a Torrent Power customer care centre. You can then obtain the form and submit the completed form and documents in person. Torrent Power charges a nominal fee for the name change and verifies the information before processing the request.
